name: Silent Butt Deadly
description:
PLOT

Ricky has only 2 minutes left of his test, but unfortunately he isn't feeling well and really needs to pass some gas.

Help Ricky by finding distractions around the room by covering the sounds and managing suspicion from Mrs Windham and the other students.

Corporate Jam

Silent Butt Deadly was build as part of the Samurai Punk Corporate Jam. An ethical jam where instead of working 40 hour over two days, its spread over the whole week.
